Dinosaurs & Prehistoric Life.name: Ancient Venom & Flight
Dinosaurs & Prehistoric Life.description: Test your knowledge of prehistoric creatures, from venomous snakes to soaring birds. This quiz explores the diversity of life that once thrived on Earth. Discover fascinating facts about these ancient animals and their unique adaptations.

questions.text: Which of these snakes is poisonous?
questions.hint: This snake’s name suggests a metallic hue and is a venomous pit viper.

questions.text: What kind of animal is a peregrine?
questions.hint: This creature is known for its incredible speed, especially when diving.

questions.text: Which of these animals lays eggs?
questions.hint: This animal is an amphibian, unlike the others, which are mammals.

Dinosaurs & Prehistoric Life.name: Giants of the Past
Dinosaurs & Prehistoric Life.description: Delve into the world of colossal creatures that once roamed the planet. This quiz focuses on the largest animals ever to live, from the blue whale to prehistoric behemoths. Prepare to be amazed by the sheer scale of these incredible beings.

questions.text: Which of these Australian birds is most closely related to the ostrich?
questions.hint: This flightless bird is a large, native Australian species.

questions.text: What is the largest animal ever to live on Earth?
questions.hint: This marine creature dwarfs even the largest dinosaurs.

questions.text: What is the largest animal ever to live on Earth?
questions.hint: This marine creature dwarfs even the largest dinosaurs.

questions.text: What is another name for the camelopard?
questions.hint: This animal’s long neck and spots make it unmistakable in the savanna.

questions.text: Elephant tusks are made of what material?
questions.hint: This material is also used in piano keys and is valued for its durability.

questions.text: Which of these animals lays eggs?
questions.hint: This animal is an amphibian, unlike the others, which are mammals.

questions.hint: This flightless bird is a large, native Australian species.

Dinosaurs & Prehistoric Life.name: Sky Hunters & Ivory Giants
Dinosaurs & Prehistoric Life.description: Explore the lives of aerial predators and magnificent mammals from the prehistoric world. This quiz examines the adaptations and characteristics of creatures like peregrine falcons and elephants. Uncover the secrets of their survival and dominance.

Dinosaurs & Prehistoric Life.description: Test your knowledge of ancient reptiles and birds. This quiz focuses on the fascinating adaptations of venomous snakes and soaring birds, exploring their roles in prehistoric ecosystems. Discover the secrets of their survival and dominance.
